game.name: Brighter Days
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The last Elder Knight must stand against The Abaddon who reigns death upon those who stand in the way of his Paradise. Explore and gain strength in this hand crafted world to thwart the evil that laid waste to these Scarred Lands.
